translations.open-source-sovereignty.title: Create Your Business{$LINE_BREAK} {$START_TAG_SPAN}From Idea to Launch{$CLOSE_TAG_SPAN}
translations.open-source-sovereignty.description_part: IDEM helps you build your entire business
: logo, brand identity, business plan, web application, and deployment.
All automated by AI. Open source and sovereign.
translations.open-source-sovereignty.card_title: Your Complete Business in One Platform
translations.open-source-sovereignty.card_description: Everything you need to launch your startup
translations.open-source-sovereignty.features_descrip: From your idea, IDEM generates everything: professional logo, brand identity, business plan, legal documents, full-stack web application, and automatic cloud deployment. All powered by 200+ AI agents.
translations.open-source-sovereignty.feature.title: {$INTERPOLATION}
translations.open-source-sovereignty.readyToBuild.des: IDEM is open source under Apache 2.0 with Commons Clause. Explore the code, contribute to the project, and help build Africa's digital sovereignty. Made in Cameroon ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡² for Africa.
translations.open-source-sovereignty.github.getStarte: Clone, deploy, and start building now
translations.open-source-sovereignty.features.creatio: IDEM generates your complete business package: professional logo, brand identity, business plan, legal documents, and a full-stack web application. Everything you need to start your entrepreneurial journey.
translations.open-source-sovereignty.features.deploym: IDEM doesn't just build your appâ€”it deploys it too. Automatic deployment to the cloud with your own domain. Your business goes live in minutes, not weeks.
translations.open-source-sovereignty.features.opensou: IDEM is open source and built in Cameroon for young African entrepreneurs. You own your code, control your data, and can customize everything. No technical skills required to start.
